name: pet-adoption

scripts.dev: npm run seed && concurrently "cd server && npm run start" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.start: npm run seed && node server --ignore client
scripts.build: npm run install && cd client && npm run build && npm run seed
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i

author: Jodie Lee, Suyash Maharjan, Yukitoshi Imaizumi-Zhou
